name: Helicopter 3D flight simulator
description:
Strap on tight, pilot, because in Helicopter 3D flight simulator you need to complete 20 levels. With all kinds of different Helicopter flying missions. From simple helicopter basic training till experience assignments. If you love flying if it’s an airplane or helicopter you will surely love this new 3D flight sim. Having one of the most advanced helicopters at your disposal. In witch you successfully complete missions and meet the goals set by your commanders.

If you’re looking for a fun and in depth helicopter 3D flight simulator, Helicopter 3D flight simulator is a great choice. In the flying mode you will have loads of challenges that will test your skills as a helicopter pilot. Want to learn how to fly a helicopter without any fear, then try Helicopter 3D flight simulator. This is new android helicopter 3D flight simulator runs smooth and is a super fun and very challenging helicopter flight game that will keep you busy for hours.

Helicopter 3D flight simulator – game features
- 20 different Helicopter missions – landing , taking off, and more.
- New improved Helicopter physics.
- Change your view to Helicopter Cockpit view .
- Fly an Helicopter instead of an airplane
- Time challenge you you could enjoy the scenery of the sky around you but time is not on your side. Bring your Helicopter down before time runs out!
- Watch out for skyscrapers or else its mayday, mayday and that is not good for your Helicopter flight career.
- Different airports to land your Helicopter and to take off from.
- New aviation missions will follow.
- New Helicopter will be added.

Keep your Helicopter in the sky can be a very difficult task! You as an Helicopter pilot will experience how it feels to really fight Helicopter. VascoGames is therefore happy to bring you 3D airport Helicopter flight simulator. This is a new android Helicopter flight simulator, we hope you will enjoy to this cool new 3D flight game. To keep up-to-date about new levels and new Helicopter that will be added please follow us on Facebook or Twitter!
